Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename TRAITS = traits, class FREELIST = cds::gc::tagged::FreeList< T, typename TRAITS::backoff_strategy >>
class cds::queue::details::moir_queue_tagged< T, TRAITS, FREELIST >

A variation of Michael's queue implementation based on IBM tag scheme.

Source:
[2000] Simon Doherty, Lindsay Groves, Victor Luchangco, Mark Moir "Formal Verification of a practical lock-free queue algorithm"

This implementation is variation of Michael's lock-free queue algorithm based on IBM tag methodology. The target platform must support double word CAS primitive.

Template parameters:
  • T Type of data saved in queue's node
  • BACKOFF The back-off strategy. It applies when the concurrent updates is encountered
  • FREELIST The implementation of IBM free list
